verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, You are <S%H1819>like<s%> a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you are as a <S%H8565>whale<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas:<s%> and you <S%H1518>came<s%> <S%H1518>forth<s%> with your <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> and <S%H1804>troubled<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H7515>fouled<s%> their <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will therefore <S%H6566>spread<s%> out my <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you with a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> you up in my <S%H2764>net.<s%>

Then will I <S%H5203>leave<s%> you on the <S%H776>land,<s%> I will <S%H2904>cast<s%> you forth on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> and will cause <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H7931>remain<s%> on you, and I will <S%H7646>fill<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> with you.
And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> with your <S%H7419>height.<s%>

I will also <S%H8248>water<s%> with your <S%H1818>blood<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein you <S%H6824>swim,<s%> even to the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and the <S%H650>rivers<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of you.

And when I shall <S%H3518>put<s%> you out, I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and make the <S%H3556>stars<s%> thereof <S%H6937>dark;<s%> I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall not give her <S%H216>light.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3974>bright<s%> <S%H3974>lights<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> will I make <S%H6937>dark<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> on your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

I will also <S%H3707>vex<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H7667>destruction<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

Yes, I will make <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8074>amazed<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> you, and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be <S%H8178>horribly<s%> <S%H8175>afraid<s%> for you, when I shall <S%H5774>brandish<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> at every <S%H7281>moment,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> for his own <S%H5315>life,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall.<s%>
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you.

By the <S%H2719>swords<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> will I cause your <S%H1995>multitude<s%> to <S%H4658>fall,<s%> the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them: and they shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> the <S%H1347>pomp<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> also <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> thereof from <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4103>trouble<s%> them any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H1804>trouble<s%> them.

<S%H227>Then<s%> will I make their <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8257>deep,<s%> and cause their <S%H5104>rivers<s%> to <S%H3212>run<s%> like <S%H8081>oil,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H776>country<s%> shall be <S%H8047>destitute<s%> of that whereof it was <S%H4393>full,<s%> when I shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> with which they shall <S%H6969>lament<s%> her: the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H6969>lament<s%> her: they shall <S%H6969>lament<s%> for her, even for <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

It <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass also in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5091>wail<s%> for the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3381>cast<s%> them <S%H3381>down,<s%> even her, and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H117>famous<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to the <S%H8482>nether<s%> parts of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>
<S%H4310>Whom<s%> do you pass in <S%H5276>beauty?<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and be you <S%H7901>laid<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised.<s%>

They shall <S%H4658>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> she is <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H4900>draw<s%> her and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitudes.<s%>

The <S%H410>strong<s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> with them that <S%H5826>help<s%> him: they are <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H804>Asshur<s%> is <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H6951>company:<s%> his <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>about<s%> him: <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%>

<S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5414>set<s%> in the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and her <S%H6951>company<s%> is <S%H5439>round<s%> about her <S%H6900>grave:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5414>caused<s%> <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> is <S%H5867>Elam<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about her <S%H6900>grave,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8482>nether<s%> parts of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5414>caused<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living;<s%> yet have they <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

They have <S%H5414>set<s%> her a <S%H4904>bed<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude:<s%> her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about him: <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> was <S%H5414>caused<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> yet have they <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit:<s%> he is <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of them that be <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> is <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude:<s%> her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> about him: <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H2490>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they <S%H5414>caused<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

And they shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> that are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>hell<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> and they have <S%H5414>laid<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> but their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> shall be on their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they were the <S%H2851>terror<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
Yes, you shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> is <S%H123>Edom,<s%> her <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5387>princes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> with their <S%H1369>might<s%> are <S%H5414>laid<s%> by them that were <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> they shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> be the <S%H5257>princes<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6722>Zidonians,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain;<s%> with their <S%H2851>terror<s%> they are <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of their <S%H1369>might;<s%> and they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> with them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> them, and shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

For I have <S%H5414>caused<s%> my <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living:<s%> and he shall be <S%H7901>laid<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> even <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
